hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#Set the below parameters manually package_name="rabbitmq-server" published_version="3.7.5"
#Check distro and available version in repo : rhel7.x, Sles11.x/12.x, Ub16.x/17.x . /etc/os-release if [ $ID == "rhel" ]; then available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "sles" ]; then sudo zypper update -y available_version=$(sudo zypper info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "ubuntu" ]; then sudo apt-get update available_version=$(sudo apt-cache policy $package_name | grep Candidate | head -1 | cut -d ' ' -f 4) fi
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo" echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Availabel version in repo is $available_version" echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi
#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- #Install Dependencies sudo zypper update -y sudo zypper install -y curl zip unzip libxslt xmlto patch subversion procps ant ant-junit git-core
# Install Erlang (dependency for RabbitMQ) from source sudo zypper install -y java-1_8_0-ibm java-1_8_0-ibm-devel wget tar make perl gcc gcc-c++ libopenssl-devel libssh-devel \ ncurses-devel unixODBC unixODBC-devel export WORK_DIR=`pwd` export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib64/jvm/java
export ANT_HOME=/usr/share/ant export PATH=$PATH:$ERL_TOP/bin:/usr/lib/erlang/lib/erl_interface-3.10/bin/:$JAVA_HOME/bin:$ANT_HOME:/usr/local/bin
# Download and untar erlang source wget http://www.erlang.org/download/otp_src_20.0.tar.gz tar zxf otp_src_20.0.tar.gz cd otp_src_20.0 export ERL_TOP=$(pwd)
cd $ERL_TOP ./configure --prefix=/usr make sudo make install
#build and install elixir cd $WORK_DIR git clone https://github.com/elixir-lang/elixir cd elixir git checkout v1.6.1 make sudo make install elixir --version
#Install Hex cd $WORK_DIR git clone https://github.com/hexpm/hex.git cd hex && git checkout v0.17.7 mix install mix hex.info
# Build rabbitmq cd $WORK_DIR wget https://dl.bintray.com/rabbitmq/all/rabbitmq-server/3.7.5/rabbitmq-server-3.7.5.tar.xz tar -xf rabbitmq-server-3.7.5.tar.xz cd rabbitmq-server-3.7.5 sudo cp ../hex/_build/dev/lib/hex/ebin/* deps/.mix/archives/hex-0.17.7/hex-0.17.7/ebin/ make sudo PATH=$PATH make install
sudo mkdir -p /etc/rabbitmq echo "[{rabbit, [{loopback_users, []}]}]." | sudo tee /etc/rabbitmq/rabbitmq.config sudo ln -s $PWD/plugins deps/rabbit/plugins sudo deps/rabbit/scripts/rabbitmq-plugins enable rabbitmq_management sudo deps/rabbit/scripts/rabbitmq-server -detached
sleep 100 curl http://localhost:15672
